backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, game state types, access control, and profile query/save methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for key frontend source files across components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the frontend and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing setup using TanStack Router with puzzle pages and layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header, navigation, coin display, auth status, main content slot, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Component handling Internet Identity login state, sign-in/out UI, and principal display.
frontend/src/components/ModeTile.tsx: Reusable tile component showing a puzzle mode with icon, description, and best score.
frontend/src/components/RequireSignInDia: Dialog prompting users to sign in before saving best puzzle scores through Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBattle.ts: Fetches battle stats and saves battle wins by interacting with backend game APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useCarRacing.ts: Loads and updates the player's best car racing time through backend game calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCityBuilder.ts: Handles saving and loading simplified city layout data through backend profile updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useFarming.ts: Saves farm plot states, handles harvest updates, and loads stored farm data from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameProgress.ts: Saves generic game progress by starting, updating, and ending backend game sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfile.ts: Fetches and returns the player's profile data using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePuzzleBestScores.t: Saves best puzzle scores by running a backend game session update.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, variables, themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Displays the puzzle hub UI, showing puzzle modes and best scores with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Renders a leaderboard UI with tabs for different game modes using mock leaderboard data. Displays ranked players with icons for top positions.
frontend/src/pages/modes/BattlePage.tsx: Implements a turn‑based battle system with player/enemy actions, win/loss states, and stat saving. Includes UI for HP bars, actions, and battle feedback.
frontend/src/pages/modes/CarPage.tsx: Creates a simple racing minigame with progress tracking, car movement via arrow keys, and best‑time saving. Uses an animation loop to advance the race.
frontend/src/pages/modes/CityBuilderPage: Provides a 5x5 grid city‑building interface where players place structures costing coins and persist their layout. Loads saved cities and handles placement validation.
Runs an endless runner game that spawns obstacles, tracks score, detects collisions, and saves progress. Supports jumping via keyboard input.
frontend/src/pages/modes/FarmingPage.tsx: Implements a farming grid where crops can be planted, grow over time, and be harvested for rewards. Persists farm state and updates growth with timers.
frontend/src/pages/modes/indoor/PuzzleGa: Implements a 3x3 sliding puzzle with move tracking, win detection, scoring, and progress saving.
frontend/src/pages/modes/indoor/Reaction: Runs a timed reaction‑click game with multiple rounds, scoring based on reaction time, and progress saving.
frontend/src/pages/modes/IndoorPage.tsx: Renders the indoor games hub with navigation and lets users launch either the Reaction or Puzzle mini‑games.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/LightsOutPage: Provides a 5x5 Lights Out puzzle with solvable random setups, move tracking, scoring, and optional sign‑in for saving scores.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/MemoryMatchPa: Implements a memory‑match card game with paired symbols, move tracking, completion detection, and score saving when signed in.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/SlidingTilesP: Hosts a shuffled 3x3 sliding‑tile puzzle with move tracking, solution detection, and score saving support.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/SudokuMiniPag: Implements a 4x4 Sudoku minigame with puzzle generation, user input, mistake tracking, scoring, and optional score saving for signed‑in users.
frontend/src/pages/puzzles/WordScrambleP: Provides a word‑scramble guessing game with randomized words, attempt limits, scoring, and best‑score saving when signed in.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session‑persisted parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout settings for the project’s UI theme.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, requirements, and asset needs for the PS PUZZLE game.
